title: Cam
description: A chance run-in with a female wolf has Cam Madison believing he’s finally found his true mate. The only problem is, she alludes him and refuses the undeniable attraction between them. When he tracks her down, her family situation makes it impossible to claim the female as his own.Akira Abe is dreading the day her arranged mating takes place. She wants a life bigger than the one her father has in mind. She never expected to meet a wolf-like Cam Madison. He entices her in ways she’s never been tempted before. Will she be able to deny her budding feelings for him and uphold her duty to her family? Or will she make the most dangerous choice in her life? This super-hot paranormal romance contains an obsessed alpha werewolf who knows what and who he wants. No cheating. No cliffhangers. Complete story. This book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Lucy Evans
